item.description:
Every 2nd Friday evening is Dinner With Dharma, and every and 4th Friday evening is the Dharmatalk, but both at the Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center at 950 Massachusetts Avenue, between Central and Harvard Squares, Cambridge. 6:30 p.m. Meditation (Sitting and Breathing, led by a Buddhist nun or a leader in training) 7:00 p.m. Dinner (vegan - but ALWAYS ask because it reminds them)

There is NO COST for the Dharmatalk, which begins at 7:00 pm with meditation, then the Buddhist teaching begins at 7:30 pm.

The 7:30 p.m. Dharma Talk and Discussion (scheduled to finish around 8:30 pm) Program organized by Ven. Man Kuang and Marjorie Jacobs. They will provide Buddhist (a) perspectives affirming the importance of cultivating and (b) insights relating to issues in modern living.

Take the T to Central Square, http://www.mbta.com. Walk in TOWARDS Harvard Square until you see 950 Mass Ave on the left (south) side of the street. Please invite friends and family. If you have any questions, please call the GBBCC. Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center - Omitofo for the event at GBBCC 950 Massachusetts Avenue (#1 bus, between Red Line stops at Central Square and Harvard Square) Cambridge, MA 617-547-6670 http://www.GBBC.net - IF you speak and read Mandarin - Chinese language site has a security warning, but it's SAFE PHOTOS of the Buddhist Tea House interior http://www.yelp.com/biz_photos/4mOUw0pYc9rxpN88z-aBHA?select=O4WmjKqheqWMPgaps773sg http://gbbcc.net/portal112/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=111&Itemid=59 For driving directions please check here http://maps.google.com http://maps.google.com/maps http://bit.ly/dByxK8 http://pluralism.org/profiles/view/74842 - HDS Pluralism Project Profile-Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center (GBBCC) - includes history and statistics We look forward to seeing you there! We'll be there from 6:30pm to 8:30pm, maybe 10 pm, if we like the talk(s). For more info. for this place, please check http://www.yelp.com/biz/greater-boston-buddhist-cultural-center-cambridge (please visit Maynard's pictures of the place)
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at GBBCC who seems to be 'in the know'

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner With Dharma: Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center, 950 Mass Ave
